infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a kitchenette. You start to take note of what's in the room.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a spare room like it isn't some huge deal. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

You are in a restroom. A standard kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.desc:
I just think it's awesome that you're in a basement now. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Ah, the cubicle. This is some kind of cubicle, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. You begin looking for stuff.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a workshop.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You're now in the steam room. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an unguarded exit to the north.

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First stop, try to take a trip south. Okay, and then, take a trip west. That done, make an effort to head south. And then, try to go west. Once you finish that, venture south. Okay, and then, go to the east. Then, go south. Next, take a trip south. Okay, and then, pick up the coin from the floor of the steam room. That's it!
